text: 35|44|Arau ihamte prthiraita paraibhramana karaa na'ine, tetiyahe ihamte dekhiba parailehemtena ihamtara purbarartibilakara ki parainama haichila. Athaca sihamta achila ihamtatakaiyo saktisali. Allaha enekuraa nahaya ye, akasasamuha arau prthiraira konorae te'omka aksama karaiba paraiba. Niscaya te'om sarbajna, sarbasaktimana.
